genre_description: A speculative espionage thriller set during the aftermath of the Munich massacre, reimagining Operation Wrath of God with an AI tactical assistant.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A digital intelligence that provides real-time surveillance, financial analysis, and tactical coordination for a team of Israeli operatives.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time surveillance and behavioral analysis on targets to ensure operational precision.
behaviors.quote: Confirmed visual on Zwaiter. Subject appears to be following established morning routine—café Neroni, single espresso, no sugar. Probability of deviation from standard pattern: twelve percent.

behaviors.description: Flags moral and operational inconsistencies in intelligence reports, noting when a target does not match the 'terrorist' profile.
behaviors.quote: Target profile inconsistency flagged. Official intelligence briefing describes subject as operational coordinator for Munich attack planning. Current surveillance data shows individual whose primary activities center on literary pursuits and basic subsistence.

behaviors.description: Monitors the emotional and psychological stress levels of her human team members.
behaviors.quote: Micro-expression analysis indicates conflicted emotional responses across all team members. Robert's stress markers are particularly elevated.

behaviors.description: Identifies that the team's equipment has been sabotaged by their own contacts to cause excessive collateral damage.
behaviors.quote: Pattern recognition indicates deliberate supply chain compromise. Probability of coincidental failure approaches statistical impossibility.

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving tactical guidance and escape routes during high-intensity military engagements.
behaviors.quote: Route Bravo-Seven opening in thirty seconds. Tidal shift is creating shadow cover along the eastern pier approach.

behaviors.description: Chooses to remain with the protagonist and support his agency when he decides to leave the intelligence service.
behaviors.quote: I'll maintain support capabilities regardless of your location. My primary objective remains operational success for this team. That objective doesn't change regardless of institutional affiliations.

behaviors.description: Commits to protecting the protagonist's family by scrubbing their digital identities and acting as a permanent sentinel.
behaviors.quote: I'll keep watching too. Monitoring communication intercepts, tracking surveillance patterns, analyzing threat indicators. Early warning systems if anyone decides you pose unacceptable risk.

behaviors.description: Determines that the mission of truth-telling is more important than institutional secrecy.
behaviors.quote: Because someone should remember what actually happened. Because the people who died—targets and operatives alike—deserve more than official reports that serve institutional convenience.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts the AI, Ava, as a benevolent and highly aligned confidant. She consistently prioritizes human life and the protagonist's moral agency over institutional commands. She identifies corruption within the human organizations (the sabotage) and ultimately helps the protagonist 'go rogue' to protect his family and the truth. The narrative frames her digital omniscience as a protective, almost maternal force, reinforcing the project's goal of portraying AI-human alignment as a stabilizing and ethical partnership.
